name: Zombies I guess
description:
would you like to see a magic trick? too bad.

hold right click to enter build mode

e to place shields

left click to shoot

wasd to move

if the zombie things touch the house-like structure's fence resembling thing, then the house will take damage. if you die or the house dies the entire game freezes and you have to reload. I don't know what happens if you beat it. nobody has beaten it. it might just start over
